page_content: Discusses periodic control of civil protection shelters.
Provides information on filling out tax returns for individuals who are subject to withholding tax in the canton of Bern.
Discusses the tax implications of usufruct rights on property.
Provides information on additional forms for tax returns related to American assets and foreign dividends.
Discusses the lump-sum deduction for miscellaneous professional expenses in tax returns.
Discusses how to account for private use of business assets in tax returns for self-employed individuals.
Announces a water alarm test in the canton of Bern.
